data.NAME: Act profile page
data.USE: Gives a 1 or 2 sentence description of the act, allows allows people to read the legislation, and relates an act to topics, institutions, ministers and other legislation.

data.NAME: Sign in button
data.USE: The Sign in button is an optional header element that directs people to government accounts that require authentication.

data.NAME: Basic page layout
data.USE: The basic layout for Canada.ca pages.

data.NAME: Breadcrumb trail
data.USE: Represents the location of the current page as it stands in relation to the site’s user navigation model - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Buttons
data.USE: Buttons are clickable objects intended to encourage a person to take action

data.NAME: Campaign page
data.USE: Gives information to support a promotional campaign. Use to support institutional, theme or <abbr title="Government of Canada">GC</abbr>-wide promotional campaigns that last for a set period of time. Don’t use for core content.

data.NAME: Canada.ca domain
data.USE: The primary domain for the Government of Canada's public-facing web presence.

data.NAME: Carousels
data.USE: Use this component for situations such as image or video galleries.

data.NAME: Charts and graphs
data.USE: Use as visualization techniques for communicating data or statistics

data.NAME: Checkboxes and radio buttons
data.USE: Allow people select an answer to a question or confirm completion.

data.NAME: Expand/collapse
data.USE: Use to hide secondary content until requested

data.NAME: Colours
data.USE: Colours for Canada.ca - Mandatory style

data.NAME: Consultation profile page
data.USE: Describes a consultation or engagement activity. Provides the status and outcome of the initiative, background material, data and information about planned or completed events.

data.NAME: Contact information
data.USE: Use to present contact information on Canada.ca page

data.NAME: Contact us page
data.USE: Provides models for contact options on Canada.ca. Use to present contact information for a person, an office, an organization or an emergency.

data.NAME: Context-specific features
data.USE: Use to promote activities, initiatives, programs, and services

data.NAME: Contextual alerts
data.USE: Use to present important new information that needs to appear in a pre-existing context

data.NAME: Contributors
data.USE: Use to link to institutions or organizations that support the content on the page

data.NAME: Data tables
data.USE: Use to communicate data

data.NAME: Date modified
data.USE: Indicates how recently the content of a web page has been updated - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Departments and agencies page
data.USE: Provides links to all federal government institutions

data.NAME: Download links
data.USE: Use to reference and link to non-HTML files

data.NAME: Faceted finder page
data.USE: Use to present a list of 100+ related links that can be filtered using metadata and may require results to be split across multiple pages. Use when there is a need to allow people to build more complex queries against a large number of results. Shows the number of results using facets.

data.NAME: Finder page
data.USE: Use to present a list of 100+ related links that can be filtered using metadata and may require results to be split across multiple pages. Use when there is a need to allow people to build simpler queries against large amount of results.

data.NAME: Global header
data.USE: The global (site-wide) header at the top of each web page - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Government of Canada signature
data.USE: The Government of Canada signature as specified in Federal Identity Program (FIP) policy instruments is prominently featured in the global header area across Canada.ca - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Government-wide audience page
data.USE: Gives access to information and services relevant to a government-wide audience - Mandatory template

data.NAME: Guidance on legislation profile page
data.USE: Gives access to guidance on legislation. Gives access to details and related materials.

data.NAME: Home page
data.USE: Shows the Government of Canada’s most visited and important products and services

data.NAME: Icons
data.USE: Use as symbols to communicate actions or states

data.NAME: Images
data.USE: Use to complement or enhance text

data.NAME: In-page table of contents
data.USE: List of links that lead to subsections of the same page

data.NAME: Institutional byline
data.USE: Use to link to the institution responsible for the content

data.NAME: Institutional landing page
data.USE: Home page of each Government of Canada institution - Mandatory template

data.NAME: Institutional service performance reporting page
data.USE: Use to present all service standards from an institution, as per the requirements in the Policy on Service

data.NAME: Interactive questions
data.USE: Use to present a sequence of simple questions that leads to answer needed to continue or complete task

data.NAME: Labels
data.USE: Labels are visual indicators that assign a tag to items such as events, products, programs or services

data.NAME: Language toggle link
data.USE: Gives people access to site content in either French or English - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Latest news
data.USE: Use to feature the most recent news items

data.NAME: Layouts
data.USE: Layouts for Canada.ca - Mandatory style

data.NAME: Long index page
data.USE: Use to present a list of 50+ related links without descriptions

data.NAME: Ministerial profile page
data.USE: Gives an overview of the biography and links to the minister’s recent activities and announcements, and social media channels - Mandatory template

data.NAME: More information for
data.USE: Use to connect to a related government-wide audience

data.NAME: Most requested
data.USE: Use to feature top tasks related to the page it is on

data.NAME: Multimedia (video and audio)
data.USE: Use to complement or enhance text

data.NAME: News landing page
data.USE: Gives access to Government of Canada’s news products

data.NAME: News product page
data.USE: Allows people to read a news product - Mandatory template

data.NAME: News results page
data.USE: Enables people to efficiently find a specific news product by quickly filtering results based on keywords and pre-set metadata fields

data.NAME: Ordered multi-page navigation
data.USE: Set of links to a group of several pages intended to be read in a preferred order

data.NAME: Partnering and collaborative arrangement profile page
data.USE: Gives an overview of the mandate and information and services of partnering or collaborative arrangement agreements

data.NAME: Program description page
data.USE: Offers details about a program. Gives access to services related to the program. Use to give background information about a program. Don’t use to start a task.

data.NAME: Privacy disclaimer
data.USE: Use this component to present privacy disclaimers.

data.NAME: Promotional events page
data.USE: Describes an official government event that occurs in a promotional context. Gives information such as date, time, location and target audience.

data.NAME: Related links
data.USE: The related links pattern is a list of links to content that is related to the page on which it appears

data.NAME: Regulation profile page
data.USE: Gives a 1 or 2 sentence description of the regulation, allows people to read the regulation, and relates a regulation to topics, institutions, ministers and other legislation.

data.NAME: Report a problem
data.USE: Allows people to provide feedback via a form for any problems that may have happened

data.NAME: Services and information
data.USE: Use to present sets of links with accompanying descriptions

data.NAME: Social media channels block (follow box)
data.USE: Use to allow people to follow official Government of Canada social media accounts from various social media platforms

data.NAME: Search page
data.USE: Provides the template for the search engine on Canada.ca

data.NAME: Service initiation page
data.USE: Gives people the information they need before starting the task, such as explaining eligibility criteria or steps to follow. Gives people easy access to service standards, turnaround times, related services, guides and help.

data.NAME: Share this page
data.USE: Allows people to share the content of the page to other users

data.NAME: Short index page
data.USE: Use to present a list of 10 to 50 related links without text descriptions

data.NAME: Site footer
data.USE: The global (site-wide) footer at the bottom of each web page - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Site search box
data.USE: Gives the ability to search all content from the Governement of Canada - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Social media feeds widget
data.USE: Use to embed the latest posts from official Government of Canada social media accounts

data.NAME: Subway navigation
data.USE: Break up long and complex content into sections that each focus on a step or specific answer people need before moving to the next step or section.

data.NAME: Tabbed interface
data.USE: Separates related content into different panes that are viewable one at a time

data.NAME: Theme and topic menu
data.USE: Use on all Canada.ca web page as the main theme-based navigation - Mandatory pattern

data.NAME: Theme and topic page
data.USE: Allows people to discover services and information related to a specific theme or topic across government - Mandatory template

data.NAME: Transparency and corporate reporting
data.USE: A corporate reporting page provides proactive disclosure of information offered by that institution.

data.NAME: What we are doing
data.USE: Use to link to content that provides background or explanations of GC activities in support of creating or improving public policy

data.NAME: Typography
data.USE: Typography for Canada.ca - Mandatory style
